tool_description: An API that shows latest Crypto News around the World.
name: Most Recent Crypto News API
title: Most Recent Crypto News API

api_list.name: Get individual Crypto News Source News
api_list.description: Will get crypto news regarding specific crypto news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://most-recent-crypto-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/cryptonewsnet"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "most-recent-crypto-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://most-recent-crypto-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{cryptonewsblogid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "most-recent-crypto-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Recent Crypto News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns news about Crypto from all over the world.
